definition: paralysis of one side of the body/hemiplegia
to lean/to slant/oblique/prejudiced/to deviate from average/to stray from the intended line/stubbornly/contrary to expectations

sentences.english: Object:To explore the methods of acupuncture and acupoint selection to increase the effect of head acupuncture on treatment of cerebral thrombosis hemiplegia.
sentences.chinese: 探讨提高头针治疗脑血栓偏瘫疗效的针刺及取穴方法。

sentences.english: Cutaneous needle was used on the recessive side of spasm limbs of hemiplegia.
sentences.chinese: 梅花针轻扣偏瘫肢体痉挛劣势侧。

sentences.english: The training of the athlete consiousness in the soccer technical training;
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨偏瘫实用训练技术的有效性和可行性。

sentences.english: Spastic limb paralysis recovery is an important issue to be resolved.
sentences.chinese: 肢体痉挛是偏瘫恢复中需要解决的重要问题。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo observe the effect of multidisciplinary rehabilitation on prognosis of patients with stroke hemiplegia.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察综合康复治疗对脑卒中偏瘫患者预后的影响。

sentences.english: Three weeks later, his right hemiparesis worsened and motor aphasia developed.
sentences.chinese: 三星期以后右侧偏瘫恶化并发生运动性失语症。

sentences.english: The application of orthosis and self-help aids to hemiplegic upper extremity was summarized.
sentences.chinese: 对中风后偏瘫上肢应用矫形器和自助具进行了综述。

sentences.english: Hemiplegia occurred in 2 cases and oculomotor nerve palsy in 2 cases.
sentences.chinese: 术后2例不全偏瘫，2例动眼神经麻痹，无死亡。

sentences.english: Paralysis of respiratory muscles often requires the use of mechanical ventilation.
sentences.chinese: 呼吸肌的偏瘫无力常导致病患需要仰赖呼吸器。

sentences.english: Conclusion Rehabilitative training is beneficial to the recovery of function of hemiplegia patients.
sentences.chinese: 结论康复训练有利于偏瘫患者的功能恢复。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the factors influencing acupuncture treatment of post-apoplectic hemiplegic omodynia.
sentences.chinese: 目的对针灸治疗中风后偏瘫肩痛的影响因素进行分析。

sentences.english: Objectives To observe the effect of rehabilitation position training of stroke - induced hemiplegia.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察脑卒中偏瘫患者进行程序化良姿位训练疗效。

sentences.english: Great attention should be paid to the evaluation and treatment of cognitive dysfunction in patients with serious hemiplegia.
sentences.chinese: 对于偏瘫较重的患者应注意其认知功能的评估与治疗。

sentences.english: Hemiplegia migraine is clinical and scarce, have send out gender and familial transmissibility two kinds.
sentences.chinese: 偏瘫型偏头痛临床少见，有散发性和家族遗传性两类。

sentences.english: Focal neurological features including hemiparesis, sensory loss, visual field deficits.
sentences.chinese: 局灶性神经表现，包括轻偏瘫，感觉缺失，视野缺损。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo observe the effect of acupuncture combined with rehabilitation training on hemiplegia patients with shoulder pain.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察针刺配合康复训练治疗偏瘫肩痛的疗效。
